GameController - Class in com.glkwhr.snakegame
GameController class receives user input and controls the game.

GameMap - Class in com.glkwhr.snakegame
GameMap class stores the information of the game map, including blocks and apples.

GameMap.Block - Enum in com.glkwhr.snakegame
Types of the blocks on the game map.
gameOver() - Method in class com.glkwhr.snakegame.GameController
This method would be called when the GameController.snake is Snake.Status.DEAD or Snake.Status.ERROR
